mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission (code, name, module, menu_code, action, url, created_at) VALUES (#{code}, #{name}, #{module}, #{menuCode}, #{action}, #{url}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.menu_code, m.name, m.module, m.node_type, m.sort_order, m.created_at::timestamp as created_at, m.parent_id FROM menu m INNER JOIN permission p ON m.menu_code = p.menu_code INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.action = 'view' AND m.node_type IN (1, 2) ORDER BY m.sort_order, m.id
